Title: Quiz Show
Summary: A young lawyer, Richard Goodwin, investigates a potentially fixed game show. Charles Van Doren, a big time show winner, is under Goodwin's investigation.

Title: Bridget Jones' baby
Summary: Bridget's focus on single life and her career is interrupted when she finds herself pregnant, but with one hitch ... she can only be fifty percent sure of the identity of her baby's father.

Title: Død snø
Summary: A ski vacation turns horrific for a group of medical students, as they find themselves confronted by an unimaginable menace: Nazi zombies.

Title: Into the Storm
Summary: Storm trackers, thrill-seekers, and everyday townspeople document an unprecedented onslaught of tornadoes touching down in the town of Silverton.

Title: Chernobyl Diaries
Summary: Six tourists hire an extreme tour guide who takes them to the abandoned city Pripyat, the former home to the workers of the Chernobyl nuclear reactor. During their exploration, they soon discover they are not alone.

Title: Stigmata
Summary: When a young woman becomes afflicted by stigmata, a priest is sent to investigate her case, which may have severe ramifications for his faith and for the Catholic Church itself.

Title: Two Night Stand
Summary: A snowstorm forces two people who made an online connection to unwillingly extend their one-night stand as the blizzard goes through the night.

Title: Land of the Lost
Summary: On his latest expedition, Dr. Rick Marshall is sucked into a space-time vortex alongside his research assistant and a redneck survivalist. In this alternate universe, the trio make friends with a primate named Chaka, their only ally in a world full of dinosaurs and other fantastic creatures.

Title: Triple 9
Summary: A gang of criminals and corrupt cops plan the murder of a police officer in order to pull off their biggest heist yet across town.

Title: Charlie Bartlett
Summary: A rich kid becomes the self-appointed psychiatrist to the student body of his new high school.

Title: The Wicker Man
Summary: A sheriff investigating the disappearance of a young girl from a small island discovers there's a larger mystery to solve among the island's secretive, neo-pagan community.

Title: Beethoven
Summary: A slobbering St. Bernard becomes the center of attention for a loving family, but must contend with a dog-napping veterinarian and his henchmen.

Title: Frances Ha
Summary: A New York woman (who doesn't really have an apartment) apprentices for a dance company (though she's not really a dancer) and throws herself headlong into her dreams, even as the possibility of realizing them dwindles.

Title: Scary Movie 5
Summary: A couple begin to experience some unusual activity after bringing their lost nieces and nephew home. With the help of home-surveillance cameras, they learn they're being stalked by a nefarious demon.

Title: A Most Violent Year
Summary: In New York City 1981, an ambitious immigrant fights to protect his business and family during the most dangerous year in the city's history.
In a totalitarian future society, a man, whose daily work is re-writing history, tries to rebel by falling in love.

Title: I Heart Huckabees
Summary: A husband-and-wife team play detective, but not in the traditional sense. Instead, the happy duo helps others solve their existential issues, the kind that keep you up at night, wondering what it all means.

Title: Spawn
Summary: An elite mercenary is killed, but comes back from Hell as a reluctant soldier of the Devil.

Title: Joy Ride
Summary: Three young people on a road trip from Colorado to New Jersey talk to a trucker on their CB radio, then must escape when he turns out to be a psychotic killer.

Title: The Awakening
Summary: In 1921, England is overwhelmed by the loss and grief of World War I. Hoax exposer Florence Cathcart visits a boarding school to explain sightings of a child ghost. Everything she believes unravels as the 'missing' begin to show themselves.

Title: The Gambler
Summary: Literature professor and gambler Jim Bennett's debt causes him to borrow money from his mother and a loan shark. Further complicating his situation, is his relationship with one of his students. Will Bennett risk his life for a second chance?

Title: The Best of Me
Summary: A pair of former high school sweethearts reunite after many years when they return to visit their small hometown.

Title: Zoolander 2
Summary: Derek and Hansel are lured into modelling again, in Rome, where they find themselves the target of a sinister conspiracy.

Title: Storbydrømme
Summary: After his career is sidelined by an unexpected tragedy and a personal blow-up, a single man must take care of his precocious daughter.

Title: Harsh Times
Summary: A tough-minded drama about two friends in South Central Los Angeles and the violence that comes between them.

Title: The Informant!
Summary: The U.S. government decides to go after an agro-business giant with a price-fixing accusation, based on the evidence submitted by their star witness, vice president-turned-informant Mark Whitacre.

Title: Farlige forbindelser
Summary: A scheming widow and her manipulative ex-lover make a bet regarding the corruption of a recently married woman.

Title: Shot Caller
Summary: A newly released prisoner is forced by the leaders of his gang to orchestrate a major crime with a brutal rival gang on the streets of Southern California.

Title: Machine Gun Preacher
Summary: Sam Childers is a former drug-dealing biker tough guy who found God and became a crusader for hundreds of Sudanese children who've been forced to become soldiers.

Title: Superman III
Summary: Synthetic kryptonite laced with tar splits Superman in two: good Clark Kent and bad Man of Steel.

Title: Jeff, Who Lives at Home
Summary: Dispatched from his basement room on an errand for his widowed mother, slacker Jeff might discover his destiny (finally) when he spends the day with his unhappily married brother as he tracks his possibly adulterous wife.

Title: Superhero Movie
Summary: Orphaned high school student Rick Riker is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly, develops super powers (except for the ability to fly), and becomes a hero.

Title: Office Christmas Party
Summary: When his uptight CEO sister threatens to shut down his branch, the branch manager throws an epic Christmas party in order to land a big client and save the day, but the party gets way out of hand...

Title: Child 44
Summary: A disgraced member of the Russian military police investigates a series of child murders during the Stalin-era Soviet Union.

Title: Manolos magiske rejse
Summary: Manolo, a young man who is torn between fulfilling the expectations of his family and following his heart, embarks on an adventure that spans three fantastic worlds where he must face his greatest fears.

Title: Manhunter
Summary: Former F.B.I. profiler Will Graham (William Petersen) returns to service to pursue a deranged serial killer named "the Tooth Fairy" (Tom Noonan) by the media.

Title: Dream House
Summary: Soon after moving into their seemingly idyllic new home, a family learns of a brutal crime committed against former residents of the dwelling.

Title: Abre los ojos
Summary: A very handsome man finds the love of his life, but he suffers an accident and needs to have his face rebuilt by surgery after it is severely disfigured.

Title: Celda 211
Summary: The story of two men on different sides of a prison riot -- the inmate leading the rebellion and the young guard trapped in the revolt, who poses as a prisoner in a desperate attempt to survive the ordeal.

Title: Fræk, frækkere, frækkest
Summary: Two con men try to settle their rivalry by betting on who can swindle a young American heiress out of fifty thousand dollars first.

Title: City of Ember
Summary: For generations, the people of the City of Ember have flourished in an amazing world of glittering lights. But Ember's once powerful generator is failing ... and the great lamps that illuminate the city are starting to flicker.

Title: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
Summary: Three friends decide to turn their fantasy vacation into reality after one of their number becomes engaged.

Title: Candyman
Summary: The Candyman, a murderous soul with a hook for a hand, is accidentally summoned to reality by a skeptic grad student researching the monster's myth.

Title: The November Man
Summary: An ex-C.I.A. operative is brought back in on a very personal mission and finds himself pitted against his former pupil in a deadly game involving high level C.I.A. officials and the Russian President-elect.

Title: Dræberen
Summary: A traveling mariachi is mistaken for a murderous criminal and must hide from a gang bent on killing him.

Title: En russer rydder op i Chicago
Summary: A tough Russian policeman is forced to partner up with a cocky Chicago police detective when he is sent to Chicago to apprehend a Georgian drug lord who killed his partner and fled the country.

Title: Blue Ruin
Summary: A mysterious outsider's quiet life is turned upside down when he returns to his childhood home to carry out an act of vengeance. Proving himself an amateur assassin, he winds up in a brutal fight to protect his estranged family.

Title: Sliding Doors
Summary: A London woman's love life and career both hinge, unknown to her, on whether or not she catches a train. We see it both ways, in parallel.

Title: Røven af 4. division
Summary: Two friends who are dissatisfied with their jobs decide to join the army for a bit of fun.

Title: Red State
Summary: Set in Middle America, a group of teens receive an online invitation for sex, though they soon encounter fundamentalists with a much more sinister agenda.

Title: Samleren
Summary: Police hunting for a serial kidnapper are helped when a victim manages to escape for the first time.

Title: Sisters
Summary: Two sisters decide to throw one last house party before their parents sell their family home.

Title: Magic in the Moonlight
Summary: A romantic comedy about an Englishman brought in to help unmask a possible swindle. Personal and professional complications ensue.

Title: Robot & Frank
Summary: In the near future, an ex-jewel thief receives a gift from his son: a robot butler programmed to look after him. But soon the two companions try their luck as a heist team.

Title: My Super Ex-Girlfriend
Summary: When a regular guy dumps a superhero for her neediness, she uses her powers to make his life a living hell.

Title: En ny chance til Larry Crowne
Summary: After losing his job, a middle-aged man reinvents himself by going back to college.

Title: Blockers
Summary: Three parents try to stop their daughters from losing their virginity on prom night.

Title: Smagen af rust og ben
Summary: Put in charge of his young son, Alain leaves Belgium for Antibes to live with his sister and her husband as a family. Alain's bond with Stephanie, a killer whale trainer, grows deeper after Stephanie suffers a horrible accident.

Title: Nattens skygger
Summary: Haunted by the patients he failed to save, an extremely burned-out Manhattan ambulance paramedic fights to maintain his sanity over three fraught and turbulent nights.

Title: Gys i blomsterbutikken
Summary: A nerdy florist finds his chance for success and romance with the help of a giant man-eating plant who demands to be fed.

Title: Daddy Day Care
Summary: Two men get laid off and have to become stay-at-home dads when they can't find jobs. This inspires them to open their own day-care center.

Title: The Gift
Summary: A woman with extrasensory perception is asked to help find a young woman who has disappeared.

Title: Laksefiskeri i Yemen
Summary: A fisheries expert is approached by a consultant to help realize a sheik's vision of bringing the sport of fly-fishing to the desert and embarks on an upstream journey of faith and fish to prove the impossible possible.

Title: Pagten
Summary: In 18th century France, the Chevalier de Fronsac and his native American friend Mani are sent by the King to the Gevaudan province to investigate the killings of hundreds by a mysterious beast.

Title: The Night Before
Summary: On Christmas eve, three lifelong friends spend the night in New York City looking for the Holy Grail of Christmas parties.

Title: American Assassin
Summary: After the death of his girlfriend at the hands of terrorists, Mitch Rapp is drawn into the world of counterterrorism, mentored by tough-as-nails former U.S. Navy S.E.A.L. Stan Hurley.

Title: Searching for Sugar Man
Summary: Two South Africans set out to discover what happened to their unlikely musical hero, the mysterious 1970s rock n roller, Rodriguez.

Title: Mystery Men
Summary: A group of inept amateur superheroes must try to save the day when a supervillian threatens to destroy a major superhero and the city.

Title: Exit Through the Gift Shop
Summary: The story of how an eccentric French shop-keeper and amateur film-maker attempted to locate and befriend Banksy, only to have the artist turn the camera back on its owner. The film contains...                See full summary »

Title: The Ring
Summary: A reporter and her ex-husband investigate a cursed video tape that is rumored to kill the viewer seven days after watching it.

Title: The Boondock Saints II: All Saints Day
Summary: The MacManus brothers are living a quiet life in Ireland with their father, but when they learn that their beloved priest has been killed by mob forces, they go back to Boston to bring justice to those responsible and avenge the priest.

Title: Wonder Boys
Summary: An English Professor tries to deal with his wife leaving him, the arrival of his editor who has been waiting for his book for seven years, and the various problems that his friends and associates involve him in.

Title: Polar
Summary: A retiring assassin suddenly finds himself on the receiving end of a hit, contracted by none other than his own employer seeking to cash in on the pensions of aging employees.

Title: Mary Poppins vender tilbage
Summary: Decades after her original visit, the magical nanny returns to help the Banks siblings and Michael's children through a difficult time in their lives.

Title: Paranormal Activity 4
Summary: It has been five years since the disappearance of Katie and Hunter, and a suburban family witness strange events in their neighborhood when a woman and a mysterious child move in.

Title: Araknofobi
Summary: A species of South American killer spider hitches a lift to the U.S. in a coffin and starts to breed and kill.

Title: The Specialist
Summary: A woman entices a bomb expert she's involved with into destroying the mafia that killed her family.

Title: Cube 2: Hypercube
Summary: Eight strangers awaken with no memory, in a puzzling cube-shaped room where the laws of physics do not always apply.

Title: En simpel plan
Summary: When three blue collar acquaintances come across millions of dollars in lost cash they make a plan to keep their find from the authorities but find complications and mistrust weaving its way into their plan.

Title: Anomalisa
Summary: A man crippled by the mundanity of his life experiences something out of the ordinary.

Title: Den blå lagune
Summary: In the Victorian period, two children are shipwrecked on a tropical island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together, unaware that sexual maturity will eventually intervene.

Title: The Signal
Summary: On a road trip, Nic and two friends are drawn to an isolated area by a computer genius. When everything suddenly goes dark, Nic regains consciousness - only to find himself in a waking nightmare.

Title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
Summary: When the world is threatened by an ancient evil, the four adolescent turtles must reunite and overcome their faults in order to stand against it.

Title: Richie Rich - Verdens rigeste dreng
Summary: A rich young boy finds his family targeted in an inside job and must use his cunning to save them.

Title: Jigsaw
Summary: Bodies are turning up around the city, each having met a uniquely gruesome demise. As the investigation proceeds, evidence points to one suspect: John Kramer, the man known as Jigsaw, who has been dead for over 10 years.

Title: Black Snake Moan
Summary: A God-fearing bluesman takes to a wild young woman who, as a victim of childhood sexual abuse, looks everywhere for love, never quite finding it.

Title: Resten af dagen
Summary: A butler, Stevens (Sir Anthony Hopkins), who sacrificed body and soul to service in the years leading up to World War II realizes too late how misguided his loyalty was to his lordly employer.

Title: Turner & hund
Summary: A detective must adopt the dog of a dead man to help him find the murderer.

Title: Bill og Teds uovertrufne eventyr
Summary: A tyrant from the future creates evil android doubles of Bill and Ted and sends them back to eliminate the originals.

Title: Day of the Dead
Summary: A small group of military officers and scientists dwell in an underground bunker as the world above is overrun by zombies.

Title: The Saint - Helgenen
Summary: Simon Templar (The Saint), is a thief for hire, whose latest job to steal the secret process for cold fusion puts him at odds with a traitor bent on toppling the Russian government, as well as the woman who holds its secret.

Title: Four Christmases
Summary: A couple struggles to visit all four of their divorced parents on Christmas.

Title: The Man with the Iron Fists
Summary: On the hunt for a fabled treasure of gold, a band of warriors, assassins, and a rogue British soldier descend upon a village in feudal China, where a humble blacksmith looks to defend himself and his fellow villagers.

Title: The Devil's Double
Summary: A chilling vision of the House of Saddam Hussein comes to life through the eyes of the man who was forced to become the double of Hussein's sadistic son.

Title: Himlen over Berlin
Summary: An angel tires of overseeing human activity and wishes to become human when he falls in love with a mortal.

Title: Runner Runner
Summary: When a poor college student who cracks an online poker game goes bust, he arranges a face-to-face with the man he thinks cheated him, a sly offshore entrepreneur.

Title: Spirit - Hingsten fra Cimarron
Summary: A wild stallion is captured by humans and slowly loses the will to resist training, yet, throughout his struggles for freedom, the stallion refuses to let go of the hope of one day returning home to his herd.

Title: Mr. Holmes
Summary: An aged, retired Sherlock Holmes deals with early dementia, as he tries to remember his final case, and a mysterious woman, whose memory haunts him. He also befriends a fan, the young son of his housekeeper, who wants him to work again.

Title: 13 Assassins
Summary: A group of assassins come together for a suicide mission to kill an evil lord.

Title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
Summary: When Raj meets Simran in Europe, it isn't love at first sight but when Simran moves to India for an arranged marriage, love makes its presence felt.

Title: Hva' med Bob?
Summary: A successful psychotherapist loses his mind after one of his most dependent patients, an obsessive-compulsive neurotic, tracks him down during his family vacation.

Title: Brooklyn's Finest
Summary: Three unconnected Brooklyn cops wind up at the same deadly location after enduring vastly different career paths.

Title: Kiss of the Dragon
Summary: A betrayed intelligence officer enlists the aid of a prostitute to prove his innocence from a deadly conspiracy while returning a favor to her.

Title: Control
Summary: A profile of Ian Curtis, the enigmatic singer of Joy Division whose personal, professional, and romantic troubles led him to commit suicide at the age of 23.

Title: Kal Ho Naa Ho
Summary: Naina, an introverted, perpetually depressed girl's life changes when she meets Aman. But Aman has a secret of his own which changes their lives forever. Embroiled in all this is Rohit, Naina's best friend who conceals his love for her.

Title: The Ritual
Summary: A group of college friends reunite for a trip to the forest, but encounter a menacing presence in the woods that's stalking them.

Title: The Mountain Between Us
Summary: Stranded after a tragic plane crash, two strangers must forge a connection to survive the extreme elements of a remote snow-covered mountain. When they realize help is not coming, they embark on a perilous journey across the wilderness.

Title: Dorian Gray
Summary: A corrupt young man somehow keeps his youthful beauty eternally, but a special painting gradually reveals his inner ugliness to all.

Title: Observe and Report
Summary: Bi-polar mall security guard Ronnie Barnhardt is called into action to stop a flasher from turning shopper's paradise into his personal peep show. But when Barnhardt can't bring the culprit to justice, a surly police detective is recruited to close the case.

Title: Showtime
Summary: A spoof of buddy cop movies where two very different cops are forced to team up on a new reality based television cop show, while tracking down the manufacturer and distributor of an illegally made semi-automatic firearm.

Title: Tågen
Summary: An unearthly fog rolls into a small coastal town exactly 100 years after a ship mysteriously sank in its waters.

Title: The Spirit
Summary: Rookie cop Denny Colt returns from the beyond as The Spirit, a hero whose mission is to fight against the bad forces in Central City.

Title: Hr. Peabody & Sherman
Summary: The time-travelling adventures of an advanced canine and his adopted son, as they endeavor to fix a time rift they created.

Title: Breaking the Waves
Summary: Oilman Jan is paralyzed in an accident. His wife, who prayed for his return, feels guilty; even more, when Jan urges her to have sex with another.

Title: Showgirls
Summary: Nomi, a young drifter, arrives in Las Vegas to become a dancer and soon sets about clawing and pushing her way to become the top of the Vegas showgirls.

Title: Magiske Ella
Summary: Ella is under a spell to be constantly obedient, a fact she must hide from her new step-family in order to protect the prince of the land, her friend for whom she's falling.

Title: Punisher: War Zone
Summary: Frank Castle known as Punisher ruthlessly demolishes organized crime, but it starts an even bigger war.

Title: When in Rome
Summary: Beth is a young, ambitious New Yorker who is completely unlucky in love. However, on a whirlwind trip to Rome, she impulsively steals some coins from a reputed fountain of love, and is then aggressively pursued by a band of suitors.

Title: Timeline
Summary: A group of archaeologists become trapped in the past when they go there to retrieve a friend. The group must survive in 14th century France before they can escape back to the 21st Century.

Title: Penelope
Summary: A modern romantic tale about a young aristocratic heiress born under a curse that can only be broken when she finds true love with "one who will accept her as one of their own."

Title: The Hills Have Eyes 2
Summary: A group of National Guard trainees find themselves battling against a vicious group of mutants on their last day of training in the desert.

Title: The Devil's Backbone
Summary: After Carlos - a 12-year-old whose father has died in the Spanish Civil War - arrives at an ominous boys' orphanage, he discovers the school is haunted and has many dark secrets that he must uncover.

Title: Det skøre hold
Summary: The new owner of the Cleveland Indians puts together a purposely horrible team so they'll lose and she can move the team. But when the plot is uncovered, they start winning just to spite her.

Title: Mål!
Summary: The extremely talented Santiago Munez is given a chance at professional football, after being spotted by a scout who has ties with Newcastle United.

Title: Et frækt tilbud
Summary: A billionaire offers one million dollars to a young married couple for one night with the wife.

Title: Blondinens hævn 2
Summary: Elle Woods heads to Washington, D.C. to join the staff of a Representative in order to pass a bill to ban animal testing.

Title: Waking Life
Summary: A man shuffles through a dream meeting various people and discussing the meanings and purposes of the universe.

Title: Funny Games
Summary: Two violent young men take a mother, father, and son hostage in their vacation cabin and force them to play sadistic "games" with one another for their own amusement.

Title: That Thing You Do
Summary: A local Pennsylvania band scores a one hit wonder in 1964 and rides the star-making machinery as long as they can, with lots of help from its manager.

Title: Pride and Glory
Summary: A family's moral codes are tested when Ray Tierney investigates a case that reveals an incendiary police corruption scandal involving his own brother-in-law. For Ray, the truth is revelatory, a Pandora's Box that threatens to upend not only the Tierney legacy but the entire NYPD.

Title: Silent Hill: Revelation
Summary: When her adoptive father disappears, Sharon Da Silva is drawn into a strange and terrifying alternate reality that holds answers to the horrific nightmares that have plagued her since childhood.

Title: Dark Water
Summary: A mother and daughter, still wounded from a bitter custody dispute, hole up in a run-down apartment building. Adding further drama to their plight, they are targeted by the ghost of former resident.

Title: Blackfish
Summary: A documentary following the controversial captivity of killer whales, and its dangers for both humans and whales.

Title: Heksene fra Eastwick
Summary: Three single women in a picturesque village have their wishes granted, at a cost, when a mysterious and flamboyant man arrives in their lives.

Title: Wimbledon
Summary: A pro tennis player has lost his ambition and has fallen in rank to 119. Fortunately for him, he meets a young player on the women's circuit who helps him recapture his focus for Wimbledon.

Title: Otte helte
Summary: Brutal cold forces two Antarctic explorers to leave their team of sled dogs behind as they fend for their survival.

Title: I dine sko
Summary: Strait-laced Rose breaks off relations with her party girl sister, Maggie, over an indiscretion involving Rose's boyfriend. The chilly atmosphere is broken with the arrival of Ella, the grandmother neither sister knew existed.

Title: Nettet
Summary: A computer programmer stumbles upon a conspiracy, putting her life and the lives of those around her in great danger.

Title: The Family Stone
Summary: An uptight, conservative businesswoman accompanies her boyfriend to his eccentric and outgoing family's annual Christmas celebration and finds that she's a fish out of water in their free-spirited way of life.

Title: Hjemsøgt
Summary: After a family is forced to relocate for their son's health, they begin experiencing supernatural behavior in their new home, and uncover a sinister history.

Title: The Stepford Wives
Summary: The secret to a Stepford wife lies behind the doors of the Men's Association of how women become different and immobilized robots.

Title: Paterson
Summary: A quiet observation of the triumphs and defeats of daily life, along with the poetry evident in its smallest details.

Title: S1m0ne
Summary: A producer's film is endangered when his star walks off, so he decides to digitally create an actress to substitute for the star, becoming an overnight sensation that everyone thinks is a real person.

Title: Boksuneun naui geot
Summary: A recently laid off factory worker kidnaps his former boss' friend's daughter, hoping to use the ransom money to pay for his sister's kidney transplant.

Title: Titan A.E.
Summary: A young man learns that he has to find a hidden Earth ship before an enemy alien species does in order to secure the survival of humanity.

Title: Never Say Never Again
Summary: A S.P.E.C.T.R.E. Agent has stolen two American nuclear warheads, and James Bond must find their targets before they are detonated.

Title: The Finest Hours
Summary: The Coast Guard makes a daring rescue attempt off the coast of Cape Cod after a pair of oil tankers are destroyed during a blizzard in 1952.

Title: Gunday
Summary: The lives of Calcutta's most powerful Gunday - Bikram and Bala, changes when Nandita enters it. Then a counter-force takes charge and a thriller unfolds.

Title: Jimmy og den store fersken
Summary: An orphan, who lives with his two cruel aunts, befriends anthropomorphic bugs who live inside a giant peach, and they embark on a journey to New York City.

Title: Trouble with the Curve
Summary: A daughter tries to remedy her dysfunctional relationship with her ailing father, a decorated baseball scout by helping him in a recruiting trip which could be his last.

Title: Drishyam
Summary: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.

Title: Hvid
Summary: After his wife divorces him, a Polish immigrant plots to get even with her.

Title: Basic
Summary: A D.E.A. Agent investigates the disappearance of a legendary Army Ranger Drill Sergeant and several of his cadets during a training exercise gone severely awry.

Title: Stepmom
Summary: A terminally ill woman has to settle on her former husband's new lover, who will be their children's stepmother.

Title: Everybody's Fine
Summary: A widower who realized his only connection to his family was through his wife sets off on an impromptu road trip to reunite with each of his grown children.

Title: Pan
Summary: Twelve-year-old orphan Peter is spirited away to the magical world of Neverland, where he finds both fun and danger, and ultimately discovers his destiny -- to become the hero who will be for ever known as Peter Pan.

Title: Engel min engel
Summary: Two teenage girls share a unique bond; their parents, concerned that the friendship is too intense, separate them, and the girls take revenge.

Title: The Bandit
Summary: Baran the Bandit, released from prison after 35 years searches for vengeance and his lover.

Title: Religulous
Summary: Bill Maher's take on the current state of world religion.

Title: Like Crazy
Summary: A British college student falls for an American student, only to be separated from him when she's banned from the U.S. after overstaying her visa.

Title: The Rainmaker
Summary: An underdog lawyer takes on a fraudulent insurance company.

Title: Jakob og Peter Plys
Summary: A working-class family man, Christopher Robin, encounters his childhood friend Winnie-the-Pooh, who helps him to rediscover the joys of life.

Title: Blast from the Past
Summary: A naive man comes out into the world after spending 35 years in a nuclear fallout shelter.

Title: K-19
Summary: When Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions on its maiden voyage, the crew must race to save the ship and prevent a nuclear disaster.

Title: Senna
Summary: A documentary on Brazilian Formula One racing driver Ayrton Senna, who won the F1 world championship three times before his death at age 34.

Title: A Dog's Purpose
Summary: A dog looks to discover his purpose in life over the course of several lifetimes and owners.

Title: Enough Said
Summary: A divorced woman who decides to pursue the man she's interested in learns he's her new friend's ex-husband.

Title: Road House
Summary: A tough bouncer is hired to tame a dirty bar.

Title: Appaloosa
Summary: Two friends hired to police a small town that is suffering under the rule of a rancher find their job complicated by the arrival of a young widow.

Title: Sabotage
Summary: Members of an elite DEA task force find themselves being taken down one by one after they rob a drug cartel safe house.

Title: Ajeossi
Summary: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hope of saving the child who is his only friend.

Title: Bedrag
Summary: FBI upstart Eric O'Neill enters into a power game with his boss, Robert Hanssen, an agent who was put on trial for selling secrets to the Soviet Union.

Title: Krampus
Summary: A boy who has a bad Christmas ends up accidentally summoning a festive demon to his family home.

Title: The Brave One
Summary: Struggling to recover emotionally from a brutal assault that killed her fiancé and left her in a coma, a radio personality begins a quest for vengeance against the perpetrators that leaves a bloody trail across New York City.

Title: The Midnight Meat Train
Summary: A photographer's obsessive pursuit of dark subject matter leads him into the path of a serial killer who stalks late night commuters, ultimately butchering them in the most gruesome ways imaginable.

Title: Urban Legend
Summary: A college student suspects a series of bizarre deaths are connected to certain urban legends.

Title: Queen
Summary: A Delhi girl from a traditional family sets out on a solo honeymoon after her marriage gets cancelled.

Title: Aloha
Summary: A celebrated military contractor returns to the site of his greatest career triumphs and reconnects with a long-ago love while unexpectedly falling for the hard-charging Air Force watch-dog assigned to him.

Title: Coffee and Cigarettes
Summary: A series of vignettes that all have coffee and cigarettes in common.

Title: Vertical Limit
Summary: A climber must rescue his sister on top of K2, one of the world's biggest mountains.

Title: What a Girl Wants
Summary: An American teenager learns that her father is a wealthy British politician running for office. Although she is eager to find him, she realizes it could cause a scandal and cost him the election.

Title: Red Lights
Summary: Psychologist Margaret Matheson and her assistant study paranormal activity, which leads them to investigate a world-renowned psychic who has resurfaced years after his toughest critic mysteriously passed away.

Title: Morderisk mareridt 2
Summary: A teenage boy is haunted in his dreams by deceased child murderer Freddy Krueger, who is out to possess him in order to continue his reign of terror in the real world.

Charlie is given the gift of seeing his dead brother and others who he has lost such as his friend who died in the military, but when the girl he falls in love with's life is at risk, he must choose between his girlfriend and his brother.

Title: Elle

Summary: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic ability.

Title: The Replacements

Title: Mord mellem venner

Summary: Number 5 of a group of experimental robots in a lab is electrocuted, suddenly becomes intelligent, and escapes.

Title: Perfect Sense

Title: Best in Show
Summary: A colorful array of characters compete at a national dog show.

Title: Sanctum

Title: The Peacemaker
Summary: A US Army colonel and a civilian woman supervising him must track down stolen Russian nuclear weapons before they're used by terrorists.

Title: In the Loop

Title: Janghwa, Hongryeon
Summary: A family is haunted by the tragedies of deaths within the family.

Title: The Ice Storm

Summary: Kenny Wells, a prospector desperate for a lucky break, teams up with a similarly eager geologist and sets off on a journey to find gold in the uncharted jungle of Indonesia.

Title: Storkene

Title: The Legend of Bagger Vance
Summary: A down-and-out golfer attempts to recover his game and his life with help from a mystical caddy.

Title: Rudy

Title: Ondskabens hus
Summary: An amusement park mogul offers a group of diverse people $1,000,000 to spend the night in a haunted house with a horrifying past.

Title: Små og store synder
Summary: An ophthalmologist's mistress threatens to reveal their affair to his wife while a married documentary filmmaker is infatuated with another woman.

Title: The Astronaut's Wife

Title: Stand Up Guys

Title: Mørkets vogtere

Title: The Highwaymen

Title: G.O.R.A.

Title: The Chaser

Summary: After an odd new medical student arrives on campus, a dedicated local and his girlfriend become involved in bizarre experiments centering around the re-animation of dead tissue.

Summary: After a cyber-attack reveals the identity of all of the active undercover agents in Britain, Johnny English is forced to come out of retirement to find the mastermind hacker.

Summary: Carmen's caught in a virtual reality game designed by the Kids' new nemesis, the Toymaker. It's up to Juni to save his sister, and ultimately the world.

Summary: Psychic John Clancy (Sir Anthony Hopkins) works with the F.B.I. in order to hunt down a serial killer.

Summary: The vampire Lestat becomes a rock star whose music wakes up the queen of all vampires.

Summary: Follows hard-to-please Aurora looking for love, and her daughter's family problems.

Summary: Maria Altmann, an octogenarian Jewish refugee, takes on the Austrian government to recover artwork she believes rightfully belongs to her family.

Summary: A newspaper journalist discovers a homeless musical genius and tries to improve his situation.

Title: Chaos
Summary: Two cops, a rookie and a grizzled vet, pursue an accomplished bank robber.

Summary: A young pilot stumbles onto a prototype jetpack that allows him to become a high flying masked hero.

Several women enter a science fiction author's life over the course of a few years, after the author has lost the woman he considers his one true love.

Title: Pride

Summary: The three best of the disbanded Musketeers - Athos, Porthos, and Aramis - join a young hotheaded would-be-Musketeer, D'Artagnan, to stop the Cardinal Richelieu's evil plot: to form an ...                See full summary »

Summary: An American master chemist plans to score big on a once in a lifetime drug deal. All does not go as planned and he is soon entangled in a web of deceit.

Summary: Two con artists try to swindle a stamp collector by selling him a sheet of counterfeit rare stamps (the "nine queens").

Summary: Stuart and Snowbell set out across town to rescue a friend.

Title: Martha Marcy May Marlene

Title: Departures

Title: Herretur

Title: Breakdown - det kunne ske for dig

Title: The Big Wedding

Summary: Two mismatched security guards are thrown together to bust a smuggling operation.

Summary: A sci-fi/thriller story centered on a special-ops team that is dispatched to fight supernatural beings.

Title: Ka' du høre hvad jeg ser?

Title: The Rebound

Title: Svampebob: En rigtig landkrabbe

Summary: A tough-as-nails cop teams up with an undercover agent to shut down a sinister mobster and his crew.

Title: Down by Law

Title: The Fan

Title: Mommy
Summary: A widowed single mother, raising her violent son alone, finds new hope when a mysterious neighbor inserts herself into their household.

Title: Miracle

Title: Under the Tuscan Sun

Title: Batman: The Killing Joke
Summary: As Batman hunts for the escaped Joker, the Clown Prince of Crime attacks the Gordon family to prove a diabolical point mirroring his own fall into madness.

Title: Scanners

Title: Tre mand og en baby
Summary: Three bachelors find themselves forced to take care of a baby left by one of the guys' girlfriends.

Title: Bachelorette
Summary: Three friends are asked to be bridesmaids at a wedding of a woman they used to ridicule back in high school.

Title: Dip huet seung hung
Summary: A disillusioned assassin accepts one last hit in hopes of using his earnings to restore vision to a singer he accidentally blinded, only to be double-crossed by his boss.

Title: Saved!

Title: Psycho
Summary: A young female embezzler arrives at the Bates Motel, which has terrible secrets of its own.

Title: Bad Company
Summary: When an Ivy League-educated C.I.A. Agent is killed during an operation, the secret agency recruits his twin brother (Chris Rock).

Title: Very Bad Things
Summary: A prostitute is killed during a bachelor party and the attendees turn on each other as the wedding approaches.

Title: Mortal Kombat: Annihilation

Title: Nøgen frokost

Title: Mimic

Title: The Lunchbox

Summary: After his wife is assaulted, a husband enlists the services of a vigilante group to help him settle the score. Then he discovers they want a 'favor' from him in return.

Title: Tully

Title: Extract

Title: Afsløring
Summary: A computer specialist is sued for sexual harassment by a former lover turned boss who initiated the act forcefully, which threatens both his career and his personal life.

Title: RoboCop 3

Title: Jab We Met
Summary: A depressed wealthy businessman finds his life changing after he meets a spunky and care-free young woman.

Title: Sinister 2
Summary: A young mother and her twin sons move into a rural house that's marked for death.

Title: Vinden der ryster kornet
Summary: Against the backdrop of the Irish War of Independence, two brothers fight a guerrilla war against British forces.

Title: Death at a Funeral

Title: The Matador
Summary: A globetrotting hitman and a crestfallen businessman meet in a hotel bar in Mexico City in an encounter that draws them together in a way neither expected.

Title: Dumbo
Summary: A young elephant, whose oversized ears enable him to fly, helps save a struggling circus, but when the circus plans a new venture, Dumbo and his friends discover dark secrets beneath its shiny veneer.

Title: Ordinary People: En ganske almindelig familie

Title: Yeopgijeogin geunyeo

The events leading up to an 11:14 p.m. car crash, from five very different perspectives.

Title: Reality Bites
Summary: A documentary filmmaker and her fellow Gen X graduates face life after college, looking for work and love in Houston.

Title: Stor ståhej for ingenting
Summary: Young lovers Hero and Claudio, soon to wed, conspire to get verbal sparring partners and confirmed singles Benedick and Beatrice to wed as well.

Title: Det stærke køn

Title: Lystløgneren og den forsvundne dreng

Title: The Zero Theorem

Summary: The Man of Steel crusades for nuclear disarmament and meets Lex Luthor's latest creation, Nuclear Man.

Title: Filmen om Radiserne: Med Nuser og Søren Brun
Summary: Snoopy embarks upon his greatest mission as he and his team take to the skies to pursue their archnemesis, while his best pal Charlie Brown begins his own epic quest back home to win the love of his life.

Title: Yip Man 3
Summary: When a band of brutal gangsters led by a crooked property developer make a play to take over a local school, Master Ip is forced to take a stand.

Title: The Ridiculous 6
Summary: An outlaw who was raised by Native Americans discovers that he has five half-brothers; together the men go on a mission to find their wayward, deadbeat dad.

Title: Spillets regler
Summary: A back-up quarterback is chosen to lead a Texas football team to victory after the star quarterback is injured.

Title: Big Stan
Summary: A weak con man panics when he learns he's going to prison for fraud. He hires a mysterious martial arts guru who helps transform him into a martial arts expert who can fight off inmates who want to hurt or love him.

Title: Politiskolen 3 - Tilbage på anstalten
Summary: The alumni of Commandant Lassard's Politiskolen (1984) return to the school to train new recruits and prevent its closure.

Title: Cradle 2 the Grave
Summary: A jewel thief's daughter is kidnapped after he steals a collection of prized black diamonds, which aren't at all what they seem.

Title: Dr. Dolittle 2
Summary: Dolittle must save a forest and a bear's life.

Title: I Don't Feel at Home in This World Anymore.
Summary: When a depressed woman is burgled, she finds a new sense of purpose by tracking down the thieves alongside her obnoxious neighbour. But they soon find themselves dangerously out of their depth against a pack of degenerate criminals.

Title: Romy and Michele's High School Reunion
Summary: Two dim-witted, inseparable friends hit the road for their ten-year high school reunion and concoct an elaborate lie about their lives in order to impress their classmates.

Title: Laggies
Summary: In the throes of a quarter-life crisis, Megan panics when her boyfriend proposes, then, taking an opportunity to escape for a week, hides out in the home of her new friend, 16-year-old Annika, who lives with her world-weary single dad.

Title: Den fantastiske hjemrejse
Summary: Three pets escape from a California ranch to find their owners in San Francisco.

Title: Udaan
Summary: Expelled from his school, a 16-year old boy returns home to his abusive and oppressive father.

Title: In America
Summary: A family of Irish immigrants adjust to life on the mean streets of Hell's Kitchen while also grieving the death of a child.

Title: The Avengers - Hævnere i kjole og hvidt
Summary: Two British Agents team up to stop Sir August de Wynter from destroying the world with a weather-changing machine.

Title: Transamerica
Summary: A preoperative transgender woman takes an unexpected journey when she learns that she fathered a son, now a teenage runaway hustling on the streets of New York.

Title: Balls of Fury
Summary: Down-and-out former professional ping-pong phenom, Randy Daytona, is sucked into a maelstrom when FBI Agent Ernie Rodriguez recruits him for a secret mission. Randy is determined to bounce back and win, and to smoke out his father's killer -- arch-fiend Feng.

Title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid
Summary: The adventures of a 12 year old who is fresh out of elementary and transitions to middle school, where he has to learn the consequences and responsibility to survive the year.

Title: Maggie
Summary: A teenage girl in the Midwest becomes infected by an outbreak of a disease that slowly turns the infected into cannibalistic zombies. During her transformation, her loving father stays by her side.

Title: Rock Star
Summary: Lead singer of a tribute band becomes lead singer of the real band he idolizes.

Title: Monte Carlo
Summary: Three young women vacationing in Paris find themselves whisked away to Monte Carlo after one of the girls is mistaken for a British heiress.

Title: The Belko Experiment
Summary: In a twisted social experiment, eighty Americans are locked in their high-rise corporate office in Bogotá, Colombia, and ordered by an unknown voice coming from the company's intercom system to participate in a deadly game of kill or be killed.

Title: Hellere død end levende
Summary: A teenager has to deal with his girlfriend dumping him among family crises, homicidal paper boys, and a rival skier.

Title: Stake Land
Summary: In a world of vampires, an expert vampire hunter and his young protégé travel toward sanctuary.

Title: Ekskonernes klub
Summary: Reunited by the death of a college friend, three divorced women seek revenge on the husbands who left them for younger women.

Title: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm
Summary: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.

Title: Darbareye Elly
Summary: The mysterious disappearance of a kindergarten teacher during a picnic in the north of Iran is followed by a series of misadventures for her fellow travelers.

Title: Hope Springs

Title: Lage Raho Munna Bhai
Summary: Munna Bhai embarks on a journey with Mahatma Gandhi in order to fight against a corrupt property dealer.

Title: Halloween III: Season of the Witch
Summary: Kids all over America want Silver Shamrock masks for Halloween. Doctor Daniel Challis seeks to uncover a plot by Silver Shamrock owner Conal Cochran.

Title: Dirty Pretty Things

Title: The Producers
Summary: After putting together another Broadway flop, down-on-his-luck Producer Max Bialystock teams up with timid accountant Leo Bloom in a get-rich-quick scheme to put on the world's worst show.

Title: Arizona Dream
Summary: A young New Yorker goes to Arizona where he finds freedom to both love and dream.

Title: Catfish - en Facebook-affære
Summary: Young filmmakers document their colleague's budding online friendship with a young woman and her family which leads to an unexpected series of discoveries.
A simple yet proud farmer in the year 1922 conspires to murder his wife for financial gain, convincing his teenage son to assist. But their actions have unintended consequences.

Title: The Hitcher
Summary: A serial killer pins his crimes on two college students who gave him a ride.

Title: Stone
Summary: A convicted arsonist looks to manipulate a parole officer into a plan to secure his parole by placing his beautiful wife in the lawman's path.

Title: Happy Feet 2

Title: Michael - en engel, ikke en helgen

Title: Peppermint

Title: Slow West
Summary: A young Scottish man travels across America in pursuit of the woman he loves, attracting the attention of an outlaw who is willing to serve as a guide.

Title: Anthropoid
Summary: Based on the extraordinary true story of Operation Anthropoid, the WWII mission to assassinate SS General Reinhard Heydrich, the main architect behind the Final Solution and the Reich's third in command after Hitler and Himmler.

Title: The Inbetweeners 2

Title: Dark Places
Summary: Libby Day was only eight years old when her family was brutally murdered in their rural Kansas farmhouse. Almost thirty years later, she reluctantly agrees to revisit the crime and uncovers the wrenching truths that led up to that tragic night.

Title: Min far Toni Erdmann
Summary: A practical joking father tries to reconnect with his hard working daughter by creating an outrageous alter ego and posing as her CEO's life coach.

Title: Rob Roy
Summary: In 1713 Scotland, Rob Roy MacGregor is wronged by a nobleman and his nephew, becomes an outlaw in search of revenge while fleeing the Redcoats, and faces charges of being a Jacobite.

Title: One for the Money
Summary: Unemployed and newly-divorced Stephanie Plum lands a job at her cousin's bail-bond business, where her first assignment puts her on the trail of a wanted local cop from her romantic past.

Title: Ironclad
Summary: In thirteenth century England, a Knights Templar and few of the Barons men, fight to defend Rochester Castle against the tyrannical King John.

Title: The Return
Summary: In the Russian wilderness, two brothers face a range of new, conflicting emotions when their father - a man they know only through a single photograph - resurfaces.
A naive young man assumes a dead man's identity and finds himself embroiled in an underground world of power, violence, and chance where men gamble behind closed doors on the lives of other men.

Title: The River Wild
Summary: Rafting expert Gail takes on a pair of armed killers while navigating a spectacularly violent river.

Title: Spøgelseshuset
Summary: A realtor and his wife and children are summoned to a mansion, which they soon discover is haunted, and while they attempt to escape, he learns an important lesson about the family he has neglected.

Title: Byzantium
Summary: Residents of a coastal town learn, with deathly consequences, the secret shared by the two mysterious women who have sought shelter at a local resort.

Title: Ginger Snaps
Summary: Two death-obsessed sisters, outcasts in their suburban neighborhood, must deal with the tragic consequences when one of them is bitten by a deadly werewolf.

Title: Notorious
Summary: The life and death story of Notorious B.I.G. (a.k.a. Christopher Wallace), who came straight out of Brooklyn to take the world of rap music by storm.

Title: Tooth Fairy
Summary: A bad deed on the part of a tough minor-league hockey player results in an unusual sentence: He must serve one week as a real-life tooth fairy.

Title: The Ward
Summary: An institutionalized young woman becomes terrorized by a ghost.

Title: Extinction
Summary: A father has a recurring dream of losing his family. His nightmare turns into reality when the planet is invaded by a force bent on destruction. Fighting for their lives, he comes to realize an unknown strength to keep them safe from harm.

Title: The Damned United

Title: Ben-Hur
Summary: Judah Ben-Hur, a prince falsely accused of treason by his adopted brother, an officer in the Roman army, returns to his homeland after years at sea to seek revenge, but finds redemption.

Title: De kaldte os helte
Summary: During the Vietnam War, a soldier finds himself the outsider of his own squad when they unnecessarily kidnap a female villager.

Title: Mother
Summary: A mother desperately searches for the killer who framed her son for a girl's horrific murder.

Title: The Kid
Summary: An unhappy and disliked image consultant gets a second shot at life when he is mysteriously confronted by an eight-year-old version of himself.

Title: Kærester
Summary: A career driven professional from Manhattan is wooed by a young painter, who also happens to be the son of her psychoanalyst.

Title: Guess Who
Summary: A young woman, Theresa, brings her boyfriend, Simon, home to meet her parents and surprise them with the news of their engagement. Another surprise: Simon is white.

Title: Thirst
Summary: Through a failed medical experiment, a priest is stricken with vampirism and is forced to abandon his ascetic ways.

Title: God's Not Dead
Summary: College philosophy professor Mr. Radisson's curriculum is challenged by his new student, Josh, who believes God exists.

Title: The Lazarus Effect
Summary: A group of medical researchers discover a way to bring dead patients back to life.

Title: Endless Love
Summary: The story of a privileged girl and a charismatic boy whose instant desire sparks a love affair made only more reckless by parents trying to keep them apart.

Title: Long Shot
Summary: Journalist Fred Flarsky reunites with his childhood crush, Charlotte Field, now one of the most influential women in the world. As she prepares to make a run for the Presidency, Charlotte hires Fred as her speechwriter and sparks fly.

Title: Mit liv med Liberace
Summary: A chronicle of the tempestuous six year romance between megastar singer, Liberace, and his young lover, Scott Thorson.

Title: Taxi
Summary: A mouthy and feisty taxicab driver has hot tips for a green and inept cop set on solving a string of New York City bank robberies committed by a quartet of female Brazilian bank robbers.

Title: Big Momma's House 2
Summary: An FBI agent reprises his disguise as a corpulent old lady and takes a job as a nanny in a crime suspect's house.

Title: På skudhold
Summary: Coming from a police family, Tom Hardy ends up fighting his uncle after the murder of his father. Tom believes the killer is another cop and goes on the record with his allegations. Demoted then to river duty, the killer taunts Tom.

Title: Døden sletter alle spor
Summary: A movie sound recordist accidentally records the evidence that proves that a car accident was actually murder and consequently finds himself in danger.

Title: Love
Summary: Murphy is an American living in Paris who enters a highly sexually and emotionally charged relationship with the unstable Electra. Unaware of the effect it will have on their relationship, they invite their pretty neighbor into their bed.

Title: Anonymous

Title: Time Lapse

Title: On the Road
Summary: Young writer Sal Paradise has his life shaken by the arrival of free-spirited Dean Moriarty and his girl, Marylou. As they travel across the country, they encounter a mix of people who each impact their journey indelibly.

Title: Øjnenes hemmelighed
Summary: A tight-knit team of rising investigators, along with their supervisor, is suddenly torn apart when they discover that one of their own teenage daughters has been brutally murdered.

Title: Creepshow
Summary: An anthology which tells five terrifying tales based on the E.C. horror comic books of the 1950s.

Title: Skat, barnet er forstørret
Summary: The Szalinski family is back, this time hilarious disaster strikes when an experiment causes their new toddler son to grow many stories tall.

Title: All About Steve
Summary: Convinced that a CCN cameraman is her true love, an eccentric crossword puzzler trails him as he travels all over the country, hoping to convince him that they belong together.

Title: Freddy's Dead: The Final Nightmare

Title: CHIPS

Title: Shadow of the Vampire
Summary: The filming of Nosferatu (1922) is hampered by the fact that its star Max Schreck is taking the role of a vampire far more seriously than seems humanly possible.

Title: Titanernes kamp
Summary: Perseus must battle Medusa and the Kraken to save the Princess Andromeda.

Title: Roxanne - Næsen er i vejen
Summary: The large-nosed C.D. Bales is in love with the beautiful Roxanne; she falls for his personality but another man's looks.

Title: Vishwaroopam
Summary: When a classical dancer's suspecting wife sets an investigator behind him, a series of violent events are triggered, revealing his real identity and connection to a darker world.

Title: Dødens gab 4 - hævnen
Summary: Chief Brody's widow believes that her family is deliberately being targeted by another shark in search of revenge.

Title: Hellbound: Hellraiser II
Summary: Kirsty is brought to an institution after the death of her family, where the occult-obsessive head resurrects Julia and unleashes the Cenobites once again.

Title: Mus og mænd
Summary: Two drifters, one a gentle but slow giant, try to make money working the fields during the Depression so they can fulfill their dreams.

Title: Vintersøvn
Summary: A hotel owner and landlord in a remote Turkish village deals with conflicts within his family and a tenant behind on his rent.

Title: The Spanish Apartment
Summary: A strait-laced French student moves into an apartment in Barcelona with a cast of six other characters from all over Europe. Together, they speak the international language of love and friendship.

Title: Taxi 3
Summary: Out to stop a new gang disguised as Santa Claus, Emilien and Daniel must also handle major changes in their personal relationships.

Title: Brick Mansions
Summary: An undercover Detroit cop navigates a dangerous neighborhood that's surrounded by a containment wall with the help of an ex-con in order to bring down a crime lord and his plot to devastate the entire city.

Title: Whale Rider
Summary: A contemporary story of love, rejection and triumph as a young Maori girl fights to fulfill a destiny her grandfather refuses to recognize.

Title: Alexander og den frygtelige, skrækkelige, sløje, virkelig dårlige dag!
Summary: Alexander's day begins with gum stuck in his hair, followed by more calamities. However, he finds little sympathy from his family and begins to wonder if bad things only happen to him, his mom, dad, brother and sister - who all find themselves living through their own terrible, horrible, no good, very bad day.

Title: Driven
Summary: A young hot shot driver is in the middle of a championship season and is coming apart at the seams. A former CART champion is called in to give him guidance.

Title: Captive State
Summary: Set in a Chicago neighborhood nearly a decade after an occupation by an extraterrestrial force, 'Captive State' explores the lives on both sides of the conflict - the collaborators and dissidents.

Title: Shutter
Summary: A young photographer and his girlfriend discover mysterious shadows in their photographs after a tragic accident. They soon learn that you can not escape your past.

Title: Black Sheep
Summary: An experiment in genetic engineering turns harmless sheep into bloodthirsty killers that terrorize a sprawling New Zealand farm.

Title: Hunter Killer
Summary: An untested American submarine captain teams with U.S. Navy Seals to rescue the Russian president, who has been kidnapped by a rogue general.

Title: Down with Love
Summary: In 1962 New York City, love blossoms between a playboy journalist and a feminist advice author.

Title: Ju-On: Forbandelsen
Summary: A mysterious and vengeful spirit marks and pursues anybody who dares enter the house in which it resides.

Title: Imperium
Summary: A young FBI agent, eager to prove himself in the field, goes undercover as a white supremacist.

Title: Sophies valg
Summary: Sophie is the survivor of Nazi concentration camps, who has found a reason to live with Nathan, a sparkling if unsteady American Jew obsessed with the Holocaust.

Title: Politiskolen 4
Summary: The misfit Politiskolen (1984) graduates now are assigned to train a group of civilian volunteers to fight crime once again plaguing the streets.

Title: Fear
Summary: When Nicole met David; handsome, charming, affectionate, he was everything. It seemed perfect, but soon she sees that David has a darker side. And his adoration turns to obsession, their dream into a nightmare, and her love into fear.

Title: Dirty Harry vender tilbage
Summary: A rape victim is exacting revenge on her aggressors in a small town outside San Francisco. "Dirty" Harry Callahan, on suspension for angering his superiors (again), is assigned to the case.

Title: He's the Girl
Summary: Sworn enemies find themselves in each other's bodies, and use this to ruin each other's lives.

Title: Piranha 3DD
Summary: After the events at Lake Victoria, the pre-historic school of blood-thirsty piranhas make their way into a newly opened waterpark.

Title: Blair Witch
Summary: After discovering a video showing what he believes to be his vanished sister Heather, James and a group of friends head to the forest believed to be inhabited by the Blair Witch.

Title: Paranormal Activity: The Marked Ones
Summary: When a young man becomes the target of a malevolent entity, he must uncover its true intentions before it takes complete control of him.

Title: Death to Smoochy
Summary: A kids show host, Rainbow Randolph, is fired in disgrace while his replacement, Sheldon Mopes, aka Smoochy the Rhino, finds himself a rising star. Unfortunately for Sheldon, the business of kids television isn't all child's play.

Title: Zelig
Summary: "Documentary" about a man who can look and act like whoever he's around, and meets various famous people.

Title: How It Ends
Summary: A desperate man tries to return home to his pregnant fiancée after a mysterious apocalyptic event turns everything to chaos.

Title: Idle Hands
Summary: A teenage slacker's right hand becomes possessed with murderous intent.

Title: Buffy - vampyrernes skræk
Summary: A flighty teenage girl learns that she is her generation's destined battler of vampires.

Title: Dødsspillet
Summary: Dirty Harry Callahan must stop a sick secret contest to murder local celebrities, which includes himself as a target.

Title: North Country

Title: Fred Claus: Julemandens bror
Summary: Fred Claus, Santa's bitter older brother, is forced to move to the North Pole to help Santa and the elves prepare for Christmas in exchange for cash.

Title: Holy Motors
Summary: From dawn to dusk, a few hours in the shadowy life of a mystic man named Monsieur Oscar.

Title: Freddys sidste mareridt
Summary: The pregnant Alice finds Freddy Krueger striking through the sleeping mind of her unborn child, hoping to be reborn into the real world.

Title: Hannah Montana: Filmen
Summary: As Hannah Montana's popularity begins to take over her life, Miley Stewart, on the urging from her father takes a trip to her hometown of Crowley Corners, Tennessee to get some perspective on what matters in life the most.

Title: The Three Burials of Melquiades Estrada
Summary: Ranch hand Pete Perkins looks to fulfill the promise to his recently deceased best friend by burying him in his hometown in Mexico.

Title: Raees
Summary: A bootlegger sets out to improve his community as a promising leader but falls in a political trap.

Title: The House of the Devil
Summary: In 1983, financially struggling college student Samantha Hughes takes a strange babysitting job that coincides with a full lunar eclipse. She slowly realizes her clients harbor a terrifying secret, putting her life in mortal danger.

Title: Hjælp, det er jul!
Summary: With their daughter away, the Kranks decide to skip Christmas altogether until she decides to come home, causing an uproar when they have to celebrate the holiday at the last minute.

Title: The Spy Next Door
Summary: Former C.I.A. spy Bob Ho takes on his toughest assignment to date: looking after his girlfriend's three kids, who haven't exactly warmed to their mom's beau.

Title: Crossroads
Summary: Three childhood best friends, and a guy they just met, take a road trip across the country, finding themselves and their friendship in the process.

Title: Cumali Ceber: Allah Seni Alsin
Summary: Cumali Ceber goes to a vacation with his children.

Title: Fighting with My Family
Summary: A former wrestler and his family make a living performing at small venues around the country while his kids dream of joining World Wrestling Entertainment.

Title: Du skyder, jeg smiler
Summary: An old flame discovers her ex-boyfriend from the past is a relocated FBI informant out to stop the bad guys.

Title: The Joneses
Summary: A seemingly perfect family moves into a suburban neighborhood, but when it comes to the truth as to why they're living there, they don't exactly come clean with their neighbors.

Title: The Skeleton Twins
Summary: Having both coincidentally cheated death on the same day, estranged twins reunite with the possibility of mending their relationship.

Title: Evil Woman
Summary: A pair of buddies conspire to save their best friend from marrying the wrong woman.

Title: This Is It
Summary: A compilation of interviews, rehearsals, and backstage footage of Michael Jackson as he prepared for his series of sold-out shows in London.

Title: Jungle
Summary: A group of friends join a guide for a trek into the Bolivian jungle, searching for an Indian village. The men soon realize that the jungle is a difficult place to be.

Title: Nick of Time
Summary: An unimpressive, every-day man is forced into a situation where he is told to kill a politician to save his kidnapped daughter.

Title: Camp X-Ray
Summary: A soldier assigned to Guantanamo Bay befriends a man who has been imprisoned there.

Title: Narc
Summary: When the trail goes cold on a murder investigation of a policeman an undercover narcotics officer is lured back to the force to help solve the case.

Title: Hestehviskeren
Summary: The mother of a severely traumatized daughter enlists the aid of a unique horse trainer to help the girl's equally injured horse.

Title: Coco før Chanel
Summary: The story of Coco Chanel's rise from obscure beginnings to the heights of the fashion world.

Title: Veronikas to liv
Summary: Two parallel stories about two identical women; one living in Poland, the other in France. They don't know each other, but their lives are nevertheless profoundly connected.

Title: Annie
Summary: A young orphan girl's adventures in finding a family that will take her.

Title: Gekijô-ban poketto monsutâ - Myûtsû no gyakushû
Summary: Scientists genetically create a new Pokémon, Mewtwo, but the results are horrific and disastrous.

Title: Hustle & Flow
Summary: With help from his friends, a Memphis pimp in a mid-life crisis attempts to become a successful hip-hop emcee.

Title: Velkommen til Ch'tis
Summary: A French public servant from Provence is banished to the far North. Strongly prejudiced against this cold and inhospitable place, he leaves his family behind to relocate temporarily there, with the firm intent to quickly come back.

Title: The Forest
Summary: A woman goes into Japan's Suicide Forest to find her twin sister, and confronts supernatural terror.

Title: Balto
Summary: An outcast Husky risks his life with other sled dogs to prevent a deadly epidemic from ravaging Nome, Alaska.

Title: Blodbrødre
Summary: Twin gynecologists take full advantage of the fact that nobody can tell them apart, until their relationship begins to deteriorate over a woman.

Title: Withnail & I
Summary: In 1969, two substance-abusing, unemployed actors retreat to the countryside for a holiday that proves disastrous.

Title: The Wailing
Summary: Soon after a stranger arrives in a little village, a mysterious sickness starts spreading. A policeman, drawn into the incident, is forced to solve the mystery in order to save his daughter.

Title: The Messengers
Summary: An ominous darkness invades a seemingly serene sunflower farm in North Dakota, and the Solomon family is torn apart by suspicion, mayhem and murder.

Title: A Thousand Words
Summary: After stretching the truth on a deal with a spiritual guru, literary agent Jack McCall finds a Bodhi tree on his property. Its appearance holds a valuable lesson on the consequences of every word he speaks.

Title: The Broken Circle Breakdown
Summary: Elise and Didier fall in love at first sight, in spite of their differences. He talks, she listens. He's a romantic atheist, she's a religious realist. When their daughter becomes seriously ill, their love is put on trial.

Title: Hævnen
Summary: The lives of two Danish families cross each other, and an extraordinary but risky friendship comes into bud. But loneliness, frailty and sorrow lie in wait.

Title: Money Train
Summary: A vengeful New York City transit cop decides to steal a trainload of subway fares. His foster brother, a fellow cop, tries to protect him.

Title: Free Solo - Klatretur med livet som indsats
Summary: Alex Honnold attempts to become the first person to ever free solo climb El Capitan.

Title: The Fifth Estate
Summary: A dramatic thriller based on real events that reveals the quest to expose the deceptions and corruptions of power that turned an Internet upstart into the 21st century's most fiercely debated organization.

Title: The Tall Man
Summary: When her child goes missing, a mother looks to unravel the legend of the Tall Man, an entity who allegedly abducts children.

Title: Asterix og Obelix i kamp mod Cæsar
Summary: Inhabitants of the last unconquered village in Gaul (ancient France) use a magical potion to hold their independence from Roman invaders.

Title: Deadfall
Summary: A thriller that follows two siblings who decide to fend for themselves in the wake of a botched casino heist, and their unlikely reunion during another family's Thanksgiving celebration.

Title: L.A. Gigolo
Summary: A sex comedy centered on a serial womanizer and his jilted lover.

Title: The Medallion
Summary: A Hong Kong detective suffers a fatal accident involving a mysterious medallion and is transformed into an immortal warrior with superhuman powers.

Title: Sleeping with Other People
Summary: A good-natured womanizer and a serial cheater form a platonic relationship that helps reform them in ways, while a mutual attraction sets in.

Title: LEGO filmen 2
Summary: It's been five years since everything was awesome and the citizens are facing a huge new threat: Lego Duplo invaders from outer space, wrecking everything faster than they can rebuild.

Title: The Transporter Refueled
Summary: In the south of France, former special-ops mercenary Frank Martin enters into a game of chess with a femme-fatale and her three sidekicks who are looking for revenge against a sinister Russian kingpin.

Title: Elitesoldaten
Summary: A hard-nosed, hard-living Marine gunnery sergeant clashes with his superiors and his ex-wife as he takes command of a spoiled recon platoon with a bad attitude.

Title: Free Fire
Summary: Set in Boston in 1978, a meeting in a deserted warehouse between two gangs turns into a shoot-out and a game of survival.

Title: A Hologram for the King
Summary: A failed American sales rep looks to recoup his losses by traveling to Saudi Arabia and selling his company's product to a wealthy monarch.

Title: Enough
Summary: After running away fails, a terrified woman empowers herself in order to battle her abusive husband.

Title: Talaash
Summary: Inspector Surjan Shekhawat, who is dealing with a depressing past, has to investigate a high profile murder case, deal with his crumbling marriage and use the help and solace of a prostitute by the name of Rosie.

Title: The Gunman
Summary: A sniper on a mercenary assassination team, kills the minister of mines of the Congo. Terrier's successful kill shot forces him into hiding. Returning to the Congo years later, he becomes the target of a hit squad himself.

Title: Radio
Summary: The story of a high school coach and the developmentally challenged man who he took under his wing.

Title: In & Out
Summary: A midwestern teacher questions his sexuality after a former student makes a comment about him at the Academy Awards.

Title: Tigerland
Summary: A group of recruits go through Advanced Infantry Training at Fort Polk, Louisiana's infamous Tigerland, last stop before Vietnam for tens of thousands of young men in 1971.

Title: License to Wed
Summary: A reverend puts an engaged couple through a grueling marriage preparation course to see if they are meant to be married in his church.

Title: Last Knights
Summary: A fallen warrior rises against a corrupt and sadistic ruler to avenge his dishonored master.

Title: Adrift
Summary: A true story of survival, as a young couple's chance encounter leads them first to love, and then on the adventure of a lifetime as they face one of the most catastrophic hurricanes in recorded history.

Title: Deception
Summary: An accountant is introduced to a mysterious sex club known as The List by his lawyer friend. But in this new world, he soon becomes the prime suspect in a woman's disappearance and a multi-million dollar heist.

Title: Ich seh ich seh

Title: Værelse med udsigt

Title: JCVD
