Summary: A detective and a psychoanalyst uncover evidence of a satanic cult while investigating a young woman's terrifying past.

Title: Baader Meinhof komplekset
Summary: A look at Germany's terrorist group, The Red Army Faction (RAF), which organized bombings, robberies, kidnappings and assassinations in the late 1960s and '70s.

Title: The Libertine
Summary: The story of John Wilmot, a.k.a. the Earl of Rochester, a 17th century poet who famously drank and debauched his way to an early grave, only to earn posthumous critical acclaim for his life's work.

Title: Mr. Holland's opus
Summary: A frustrated composer finds fulfillment as a high school music teacher.

Title: Brevet i flasken
Summary: A woman discovers a tragic love letter in a bottle on a beach, and is determined to track down its author.

Title: Tom yum goong
Summary: A young fighter named Kham must go to Australia to retrieve his stolen elephant. With the help of a Thai-born Australian detective, Kham must take on all comers, including a gang led by an evil woman and her two deadly bodyguards.

Title: Alle siger 'I Love You'
Summary: A New York girl sets her father up with a beautiful woman in a troubled marriage while her stepsister gets engaged.

Title: V/H/S/2
Summary: Searching for a missing student, two private investigators break into his house and find collection of VHS tapes. Viewing the horrific contents of each cassette, they realize there may be dark motives behind the student's disappearance.

Title: Beautiful Boy
Summary: Based on the best-selling pair of memoirs from father and son David and Nic Sheff, Beautiful Boy chronicles the heartbreaking and inspiring experience of survival, relapse, and recovery in a family coping with addiction over many years.

Title: The Devil Inside
Summary: In Italy, a woman becomes involved in a series of unauthorized exorcisms during her mission to discover what happened to her mother, who allegedly murdered three people during her own exorcism.

Title: Mand bider hund
Summary: A film crew follows a ruthless thief and heartless killer as he goes about his daily routine. But complications set in when the film crew lose their objectivity and begin lending a hand.

Title: Before I Wake
Summary: A couple adopt an orphaned child whose dreams - and nightmares - manifest physically as he sleeps.

Title: Detroit Rock City
Summary: In 1978, four rebellious teenagers try to scam their way into a KISS concert.

Title: Set It Up
Summary: Two corporate executive assistants hatch a plan to match-make their two bosses.

Title: Den hemmelige have
Summary: A young, recently-orphaned girl is sent to England after living in India all her life. Once there, she begins to explore her new, seemingly-isolated surroundings -- and its secrets.

Title: Me and You and Everyone We Know
Summary: A lonely shoe salesman and an eccentric performance artist struggle to connect in this unique take on contemporary life.

Title: The Invisible
Summary: A teenager is left invisible to the living after an attack.

Title: Mean Machine
Summary: A football star jailed for assault leads a group of inmates in a match against prison guards.

Title: D2: The Mighty Ducks
Summary: Can Gordon's team win the Junior Goodwill Games in California in spite of all the set-backs?

Title: Ni måneder
Summary: When he finds out his longtime girlfriend is pregnant, a commitment-phobe realizes he might have to change his lifestyle for better or much, much worse.

Title: Fru Brisbys hemmelige verden
Summary: To save her ill son, a field mouse must seek the aid of a colony of rats, with whom she has a deeper link than she ever suspected.

Title: Baraka
Summary: A collection of expertly photographed scenes of human life and religion.

Title: The King of Kong
Summary: Die-hard gamers compete to break world records on classic arcade games.

Title: The Roommate
Summary: When college freshman Sara arrives on campus for the first time, she befriends her roommate, Rebecca, unaware that the girl is becoming dangerously obsessed with her.

Title: Den gode elev
Summary: A boy blackmails his neighbor after suspecting him to be a Nazi war criminal.

Title: The Last Days on Mars
Summary: A group of astronaut explorers succumb one by one to a mysterious and terrifying force while collecting specimens on Mars.

Title: Man of Tai Chi
Summary: A young martial artist's unparalleled Tai Chi skills land him in a highly lucrative underworld fight club.

Title: Bringing Down the House
Summary: When a lonely guy meets a woman on the internet who happens to be in prison, she breaks out to get him to prove her innocence, and proceeds to wreak havoc on his middle-class life.

Title: Bullets Over Broadway
Summary: In New York in 1928, a struggling playwright is forced to cast a mobster's talentless girlfriend in his latest drama in order to get it produced.

Title: Heksejagt
Summary: A Salem resident attempts to frame her ex-lover's wife for being a witch in the middle of the 1692 witchcraft trials.

Title: F for får - filmen
Summary: When Shaun decides to take the day off and have some fun, he gets a little more action than he bargained for. A mix up with the Farmer, a caravan and a very steep hill lead them all to the Big City and it's up to Shaun and the flock to return everyone safely to the green grass of home.

Title: Lizzie McGuire
Summary: Lizzie McGuire has graduated from middle school and takes a trip to Rome, Italy with her class. And what was supposed to be only a normal trip, becomes a teenager's dream come true.

Title: The Salvation
Summary: In 1870s America, the fury of a notorious gang leader is unleashed when a peaceful American settler avenges the death of his family. Then as his cowardly fellow townspeople betray him, he is forced to hunt down the outlaws alone.

Title: Sex & Lucia
Summary: Various lives converge on an isolated island, all connected by an author whose novel has become inextricably entwined with his own life.

Title: Cake
Summary: Claire becomes fascinated by the suicide of a woman in her chronic pain support group while grappling with her own, very raw personal tragedy.

Title: Uptown Girls
Summary: A grown-up woman, who kept her childish instincts and behavior, starts working as a nanny of a 8-year-old girl, who actually acts like an adult. But in the end everything turns to its right places.

Title: Paranoia
Summary: An entry-level employee at a powerful corporation finds himself occupying a corner office, but at a dangerous price: he must spy on his boss's old mentor to secure for him a multi-billion dollar advantage.

Title: The Fog
Summary: A thick mist full of vengeful spirits haunts a prosperous island town off the coast of Oregon, as its inhabitants try to learn their town's dark secret in order to stop it.

Title: The Cave
Summary: Bloodthirsty creatures await a pack of divers who become trapped in an underwater cave network.

Title: Bulletproof
Summary: Two criminals, Keats and Moses, end their friendship, when Keats turns out to be an undercover cop. Many years later, the two are forced to work together when Keats is assigned to protect Moses as a witness.

Title: The Physician
Summary: In Persia in the 11th Century, a surgeon's apprentice disguises himself as a Jew to study at a school that does not admit Christians.

Title: Polterabend for viderekomne
Summary: A soon-to-be-married man's friends throw him the ultimate bachelor party.

Title: Unsane
Summary: A young woman is involuntarily committed to a mental institution, where she is confronted by her greatest fear--but is it real or a product of her delusion?

Title: The Cold Light of Day
Summary: After his family is kidnapped during their sailing trip in Spain, a young Wall Street trader is confronted by the people responsible: intelligence agents looking to recover a mysterious briefcase.

Title: Kill List
Summary: Nearly a year after a botched job, a hitman takes a new assignment with the promise of a big payoff for three killings. What starts off as an easy task soon unravels, sending the killer into the heart of darkness.

Title: Emma
Summary: While matchmaking for friends and neighbours, a young 19th Century Englishwoman nearly misses her own chance at love.

Title: Købmanden i Venedig
Summary: In 16th century Venice, when a merchant must default on a large loan from an abused Jewish moneylender for a friend with romantic ambitions, the bitterly vengeful creditor demands a gruesome payment instead.

Title: Hotel Artemis
Summary: Set in riot-torn, near-future Los Angeles, 'Hotel Artemis' follows the Nurse, who runs a secret, members-only emergency room for criminals.

Title: Av min arv
Summary: A minor league baseball player has to spend thirty million dollars in thirty days, in order to inherit three hundred million dollars. However, he's not allowed to tell anyone about the deal.

Title: Turneringen
Summary: A tournament is watched by dozens of wealthy men betting on which one of the 30 assassins will survive the next 24 hours "kill or die" and claim the USD10,000,000 prize. It takes place in an English town with plenty of CCTVs.

Title: Mickey Blue Eyes
Summary: An English auctioneer proposes to the daughter of a Mafia kingpin, only to realize that certain "favors" would be asked of him.

Title: Nowhere Boy
Summary: A chronicle of John Lennon's first years, focused mainly in his adolescence and his relationship with his stern aunt Mimi, who raised him, and his absentee mother Julia, who re-entered his life at a crucial moment in his young life.

Title: Birth
Summary: A young boy attempts to convince a woman that he is her dead husband reborn.

Title: Et ikke helt almindeligt liv
Summary: A desperate guy kidnaps a daughter of his former boss who recently fired him. Two angels are sent to Earth for checking if love is possible in this case.

Title: Pink
Summary: When three young women are implicated in a crime, a retired lawyer steps forward to help them clear their names.

Title: Kliken fra St. Elmo
Summary: A group of friends, just out of college, struggle with adulthood.

Title: Stanford-fængselseksperimentet
Summary: In 1971, twenty-four male students are selected to take on randomly assigned roles of prisoners and guards in a mock prison situated in the basement of the Stanford psychology building.

Title: Snuff
Summary: While doing a thesis about violence, Ángela finds a snuff video where a girl is tortured until death. Soon she discovers that the girl was a former student in her faculty...

Title: Orgazmo
Summary: Naive young Mormon Joe Young is recruited to act in porn movies.

Title: The Human Centipede II (Full Sequence)
Summary: Inspired by the fictional Dr. Heiter, disturbed loner Martin dreams of creating a 12-person centipede and sets out to realize his sick fantasy.

Title: Would You Rather
Summary: Desperate to help her ailing brother, a young woman unknowingly agrees to compete in a deadly game of "Would You Rather," hosted by a sadistic aristocrat.

Title: Alletiders kvinder
Summary: The story of a teenage boy, his mother, and two other women who help raise him among the love and freedom of Southern California of 1979.

Title: BloodRayne
Summary: In the eighteenth century, a vampire escapes from the freak show, in which she once participated, and teams up with a group of vampire slayers to kill the man who raped her mother.

Title: I en kælder sort som kul
Summary: A research team finds a mysterious cylinder in a deserted church. If opened, it could mean the end of the world.

Title: Can You Ever Forgive Me?
Summary: When Lee Israel falls out of step with current tastes, she turns her art form to deception.

Title: Alle hunde kommer i himlen
Summary: A canine angel, Charlie, sneaks back to earth from heaven but ends up befriending an orphan girl who can speak to animals. In the process, Charlie learns that friendship is the most heavenly gift of all.

Title: The Butterfly Effect 2
Summary: Nick Larson discovers a supernatural way to alter his life and travel back in time to key moments in his life by looking at photographs.

Title: Kill Your Darlings
Summary: A murder in 1944 draws together the great poets of the beat generation: Allen Ginsberg, Jack Kerouac, and William Burroughs.

Title: Bully
Summary: A pack of naïve teenagers conspire to murder a mutual friend, whose aggressive demeanor has proved too much.

Title: The Air I Breathe
Summary: A drama based on an ancient Chinese proverb that breaks life down into four emotional cornerstones: happiness, pleasure, sorrow and love. A businessman bets his life on a horse race; a gangster sees the future; a pop star falls prey to a crime boss; a doctor must save the love of his life.

Title: Big Fat Liar: Den store løgnhals
Summary: After a young boy's school essay erroneously finds its way into the hands of a Hollywood producer who turns the idea into a hit film, the boy travels to Los Angeles to claim his credit.

Title: Maria Full of Grace
Summary: A pregnant Colombian teenager becomes a drug mule to make some desperately needed money for her family.

Title: We Are Your Friends
Summary: Caught between a forbidden romance and the expectations of his friends, aspiring DJ Cole Carter attempts to find the path in life that leads to fame and fortune.

Title: Maniac
Summary: As he helps a young artist with her upcoming exhibition, the owner of a mannequin shop's deadly, suppressed desires come to the surface.

Title: Krym
Summary: This is a story of love, faith and honor, the strength of spirit and true friendship against the backdrop of the real events of the Crimean spring of 2014.

Title: In the Land of Blood and Honey
Summary: During the Bosnian War, Danijel, a soldier fighting for the Serbs, re-encounters Ajla, a Bosnian who's now a captive in his camp he oversees. Their once promising connection has become ambiguous as their motives have changed.

Title: The Last Legion
Summary: As the Roman empire crumbles, young Romulus Augustus flees the city and embarks on a perilous voyage to Britain to track down a legion of supporters.

Title: Child's Play 3
Summary: Chucky returns for revenge against Andy, the young boy who defeated him, and now a teenager living in a military academy.

Title: Central Station
Summary: An emotive journey of a former school teacher, who writes letters for illiterate people, and a young boy, whose mother has just died, as they search for the father he never knew.

Title: The Zookeeper's Wife
Summary: The Zookeeper's Wife tells the account of keepers of the Warsaw Zoo, Antonina and Jan Zabinski, who helped save hundreds of people and animals during the German invasion.

Title: Redirected
Summary: Three friends try to make money and invite another friend in on a plot.

Title: Dommen
Summary: A lawyer sees the chance to salvage his career and self-respect by taking a medical malpractice case to trial rather than settling.

Title: Cyrus
Summary: John and Molly, a divorced middle aged man and a single mother meet at a friends party and start up a small relationship, all John has to do now is meet Molly's son... Cyrus

Title: Uri: The Surgical Strike
Summary: Indian army special forces carries a covert operation, avenging the killing of fellow army men at their base by a terrorist group.

Title: The 33
Summary: Based on the real-life event, when a gold and copper mine collapses, it traps 33 miners underground for 69 days.

Title: Adam
Summary: Adam, a lonely man with Asperger's Syndrome, develops a relationship with his upstairs neighbor, Beth.

Title: Love & Mercy
Summary: In the 1960s, Beach Boys leader Brian Wilson struggles with emerging psychosis as he attempts to craft his avant-garde pop masterpiece. In the 1980s, he is a broken, confused man under the 24-hour watch of shady therapist Dr. Eugene Landy.

Title: The Messenger
Summary: An American soldier struggles with an ethical dilemma when he becomes involved with a widow of a fallen officer.

Title: Midsommar
Summary: A couple travels to Sweden to visit a rural hometown's fabled mid-summer festival. What begins as an idyllic retreat quickly devolves into an increasingly violent and bizarre competition at the hands of a pagan cult.

Title: A.R.O.G
Summary: Commander Logar fools Arif and sends him 1.000.000 years back in the time. He must civilize people from past to reach today.

Title: Hit and Run
Summary: Former getaway driver Charles Bronson jeopardizes his Witness Protection Plan identity in order to help his girlfriend get to Los Angeles. The feds and Charles' former gang chase them on the road.

Title: La cara oculta
Summary: Shattered by the unexpected news of their irreversible break-up, an aspiring orchestra conductor is puzzled by his girlfriend's mysterious and seemingly inexplicable case of disappearance. But, can he look beyond the facts?

Title: Det ku' ske for dig
Summary: A police officer promises to share his lottery ticket with a waitress in lieu of a tip.

Title: Bandidas
Summary: In turn-of-the-century Mexico, two very different women become a bank-robbing duo in an effort to combat a ruthless enforcer terrorizing their town.

Title: Fantasia/2000
Summary: An update of the original film with new interpretations of great works of classical music.

Title: Muriels bryllup
Summary: A young social outcast in Australia steals money from her parents to finance a vacation where she hopes to find happiness, and perhaps love.

Title: Kokuhaku
Summary: A psychological thriller of a grieving mother turned cold-blooded avenger with a twisty master plan to pay back those who were responsible for her daughter's death.

Title: Klassen
Summary: Teacher and novelist François Bégaudeau plays a version of himself as he negotiates a year with his racially mixed students from a tough Parisian neighborhood.

Title: American Honey
Summary: A teenage girl with nothing to lose joins a traveling magazine sales crew, and gets caught up in a whirlwind of hard partying, law bending and young love as she criss-crosses the Midwest with a band of misfits.

Title: Ookami kodomo no Ame to Yuki
Summary: After her werewolf lover unexpectedly dies in an accident while hunting for food for their children, a young woman must find ways to raise the werewolf son and daughter that she had with him while keeping their trait hidden from society.

Title: Confidence
Summary: Jake Vig (Burns) is a consummate grifter about to pull his biggest con yet, one set to avenge his friend's murder. But his last scam backfired, leaving him indebted to a mob boss (Hoffman) and his enforcer.

Title: Private Parts
Summary: The autobiographical story of Howard Stern, the radio rebel who is now also a TV personality, an author and a movie star.

Title: Suburbicon
Summary: As a 1950s suburban community self-destructs, a home invasion has sinister consequences for one seemingly normal family.

Title: Black Sea
Summary: In order to make good with his former employers, a submarine captain takes a job with a shadowy backer to search the depths of the Black Sea for a submarine rumored to be loaded with gold.

Title: Evita
Summary: The hit musical based on the life of Evita Duarte, a B-picture Argentinian actress who eventually became the wife of Argentinian president Juan Perón, and the most beloved and hated woman in Argentina.

Title: Ingen vej tilbage
Summary: A coverup and witchhunt occur after a politician accidentally kills his mistress.

Title: Cold in July
Summary: When a protective father meets a murderous ex-con, both need to deviate from the path they are on as they soon find themselves entangled in a downwards spiral of lies and violence while having to confront their own inner psyche.

Title: Passengers
Summary: A grief counselor working with a group of plane-crash survivors finds herself at the root of a mystery when her clients begin to disappear.

Title: Lysets vogtere
Summary: A man who serves in the war between the forces of Light and Dark comes into possession of a device that can restore life to Moscow, which was nearly destroyed by an apocalyptic event.

Title: Dear Zindagi
Summary: Kaira is a budding cinematographer in search of a perfect life. Her encounter with Jug, an unconventional thinker, helps her gain a new perspective on life. She discovers that happiness is all about finding comfort in life's imperfections.

Title: Koyaanisqatsi - En verden ude af balance
Summary: A collection of expertly photographed phenomena with no conventional plot. The footage focuses on nature, humanity and the relationship between them.

Title: Grinchen
Summary: A grumpy Grinch plots to ruin Christmas for the village of Whoville.

Title: Heksene
Summary: A young boy stumbles onto a witch convention and must stop them, even after he has been turned into a mouse.

Title: 102 dalmatinere
Summary: Cruella DeVil gets out of prison and goes after the puppies once more.

Title: Joe og vulkanen
Summary: When a hypochondriac learns that he is dying, he accepts an offer to throw himself in a volcano at a tropical island, and along the way there, learns to truly live.

Title: A Bittersweet Life
Summary: Things go wrong for a high ranking mobster when he doesn't proceed by his boss's orders.

Title: The New Guy
Summary: A high school senior branded uncool in the ninth grade gets himself expelled so he changes his image to cool kid at the town's other high school.

Title: Undercover Brother
Summary: When "The Man" tries to derail a black candidate's presidential campaign, Undercover Brother and his fellow secret agents come to the rescue.

Title: McFarland, USA
Summary: Jim White moves his family after losing his last job as a football coach. He sees that some of the students are worth starting a cross-country team and turns seven students with no hope into one of the best cross-country teams.

Title: Creep
Summary: A young videographer answers an online ad for a one-day job in a remote town to record the last messages of a dying man. When he notices the man's odd behavior, he starts to question his intentions.

Title: Prom Night
Summary: Donna's senior prom is supposed to be the best night of her life, though a sadistic killer from her past has different plans for her and her friends.

Title: Thick as Thieves
Summary: A veteran thief recruits a younger crook to help him pull off one final job in order to repay his debt to the Russian mob.

Title: I Love You, Beth Cooper
Summary: A nerdy valedictorian proclaims his love for the hottest and most popular girl in school - Beth Cooper - during his graduation speech. Much to his surprise, Beth shows up at his door that very night and decides to show him the best night of his life.

Title: Don
Summary: A simple man, Vijay, is recruited by a police officer to masquerade as Don, the leader of an international gang of smugglers. But things go wrong when the officer is killed and Vijay is left to fend for himself.

Title: Admission
Summary: A Princeton admissions officer who is up for a major promotion takes a professional risk after she meets a college-bound alternative school kid who just might be the son she gave up years ago in a secret adoption.

Title: Jûbê ninpûchô
Summary: A vagabond swordsman is aided by a beautiful ninja girl and a crafty spy in confronting a demonic clan of killers - with a ghost from his past as their leader - who are bent on overthrowing the Tokugawa Shogunate.

Title: Kokken, tyven, hans kone & hendes elsker
Summary: The wife of an abusive criminal finds solace in the arms of a kind regular guest in her husband's restaurant.

Title: Manden med plæneklipperen
Summary: A simple man is turned into a genius through the application of computer science.

Title: Booksmart
Summary: On the eve of their high school graduation, two academic superstars and best friends realize they should have worked less and played more. Determined not to fall short of their peers, the girls try to cram four years of fun into one night.

Title: Red Tails
Summary: A crew of African American pilots in the Tuskegee training program, having faced segregation while kept mostly on the ground during World War II, are called into duty under the guidance of Col. A.J. Bullard.

Title: Always Be My Maybe
Summary: A pair of childhood friends end up falling for each other when they grow up.

Title: Nurse Betty
Summary: Comedy about a widow's post-traumatic obsession with a soap star.

Title: Velvet Goldmine
Summary: In 1984, British journalist Arthur Stuart investigates the career of 1970s glam superstar Brian Slade, who was heavily influenced in his early years by hard-living and rebellious American singer Curt Wild.

Title: Illusionisten
Summary: A French illusionist finds himself out of work and travels to Scotland, where he meets a young woman. Their ensuing adventure changes both their lives forever.

Title: Femme Fatale
Summary: A woman tries to straighten out her life, even as her past as a con-woman comes back to haunt her.

Title: Bitter måne
Summary: After hearing stories of her, a passenger on a cruise ship develops an irresistible infatuation with an eccentric paraplegic's wife.

Title: The Killer Inside Me
Summary: A West Texas Deputy Sheriff is slowly unmasked as a psychotic killer.

Title: Happy New Year
Summary: A gang of amateur dancers takes part in a dancing competition to avenge their personal vendetta.

Title: Eksorcisten: Begyndelsen
Summary: Years before Father Lankester Merrin helped save Regan MacNeil's soul, he first encounters the demon Pazuzu in East Africa. This is the tale of Father Merrin's initial battle with Pazuzu and the rediscovery of his faith.

Title: Drumline
Summary: A band director recruits a Harlem street drummer to play at a Southern university.

Title: Apostle
Summary: In 1905, a drifter on a dangerous mission to rescue his kidnapped sister tangles with a sinister religious cult on an isolated island.

Title: Nim og den hemmelige ø
Summary: A young girl inhabits an isolated island with her scientist father and communicates with a reclusive author of the novel she's reading.

Title: Spice World
Summary: World famous pop group the Spice Girls zip around London in their luxurious double decker tour bus having various adventures and performing for their fans.

Title: Circle
Summary: Held captive and faced with their imminent executions, fifty strangers are forced to choose the one person among them who deserves to live.

Title: Rubber
Summary: A homicidal car tire, discovering it has destructive psionic power, sets its sights on a desert town once a mysterious woman becomes its obsession.

Title: Kvinder på randen af et nervøst sammenbrud
Summary: A television actress encounters a variety of eccentric characters after embarking on a journey to discover why her lover abruptly left her.

Title: Svigermor(d)
Summary: A pastor preoccupied with writing the perfect sermon fails to realize that his wife is having an affair, and his children are up to no good.

Title: Touching the Void
Summary: The true story of two climbers and their perilous journey up the west face of Siula Grande in the Peruvian Andes in 1985.

Title: Bastille Day
Summary: A young pickpocket and an unruly CIA agent team up on an anti-terrorist mission in France.

Title: Brudens far 2
Summary: George Banks must deal not only with the pregnancy of his daughter, but also with the unexpected pregnancy of his wife.

Title: Shattered Glass
Summary: The story of a young journalist who fell from grace when it was discovered he fabricated over half of his articles from the publication The New Republic magazine.

Title: Pusher
Summary: A drug pusher grows increasingly desperate after a botched deal leaves him with a large debt to a ruthless drug lord.

Title: The Nines
Summary: A troubled actor, a television show runner, and an acclaimed videogame designer find their lives intertwining in mysterious and unsettling ways.

Title: Annie
Summary: A foster kid, who lives with her mean foster mom, sees her life change when business tycoon and New York City mayoral candidate Will Stacks makes a thinly-veiled campaign move and takes her in.

Title: Now Is Good
Summary: A girl dying of leukemia compiles a list of things she'd like to do before passing away. Topping the list is her desire to lose her virginity.

Title: Tilværelsens ulidelige lethed
Summary: In 1968, a Czech doctor with an active sex life meets a woman who wants monogamy, and then the Soviet invasion further disrupts their lives.

Title: Hollywoodland
Summary: A detective examines the mysterious death of George Reeves, the star of the television series Adventures of Superman (1952).

Title: Smoke
Summary: A Brooklyn smoke shop is the center of neighborhood activity, and the stories of its customers.

Title: The Act of Killing
Summary: A documentary which challenges former Indonesian death-squad leaders to reenact their mass-killings in whichever cinematic genres they wish, including classic Hollywood crime scenarios and lavish musical numbers.

Title: The One I Love
Summary: A troubled couple vacate to a beautiful getaway, but bizarre circumstances further complicate their situation.

Title: Bug
Summary: An unhinged war veteran holes up with a lonely woman in a spooky Oklahoma motel room. The line between reality and delusion is blurred as they discover a bug infestation.

Title: Personal Shopper
Summary: A personal shopper in Paris refuses to leave the city until she makes contact with her twin brother who previously died there. Her life becomes more complicated when a mysterious person contacts her via text message.

Title: Stranger Than Paradise
Summary: A New Yorker's life is thrown into a tailspin when his younger cousin surprise visits him, starting a strange, unpredictable adventure.

Title: Kuppet
Summary: A career jewel thief finds himself at tense odds with his longtime partner, a crime boss who sends his nephew to keep watch.

Title: Kaptajn Corellis mandolin
Summary: When a fisherman leaves to fight with the Greek army during World War II, his fiancée falls in love with the local Italian commander.

Title: Mustang
Summary: When five orphan girls are seen innocently playing with boys on a beach, their scandalized conservative guardians confine them while forced marriages are arranged.

Title: Straw Dogs
Summary: Los Angeles screenwriter David Sumner relocates with his wife to her hometown in the deep South. There, while tensions build between them, a brewing conflict with locals becomes a threat to them both.

Title: So I Married an Axe Murderer
Summary: A San Francisco poet who fears commitment suspects his girlfriend may have a knack for killing off her significant others.

Title: Black
Summary: The cathartic tale of a young woman who can't see, hear or talk and the teacher who brings a ray of light into her dark world.

Title: The Innkeepers
Summary: During the final days at the Yankee Pedlar Inn, two employees determined to reveal the hotel's haunted past begin to experience disturbing events as old guests check in for a stay.

Title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
Summary: After six years of keeping our malls safe, Paul Blart has earned a well-deserved vacation. He heads to Las Vegas with his teenage daughter before she heads off to college. But safety never takes a holiday and when duty calls, Blart answers.

Title: The Missing
Summary: In 1885 New Mexico, a frontier medicine woman forms an uneasy alliance with her estranged father when her daughter is kidnapped by an Apache brujo.

Title: Halloween 5: The Revenge of Michael Myers
Summary: One year after the events of Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers (1988), the Shape returns to Haddonfield once again in an attempt to kill his now-mute niece.

Title: Race
Summary: Jesse Owens' quest to become the greatest track and field athlete in history thrusts him onto the world stage of the 1936 Olympics, where he faces off against Adolf Hitler's vision of Aryan supremacy.

Title: Smid mor af toget
Summary: A bitter ex-husband wants his former spouse dead. A put-upon momma's boy wants his mother dead. Who will pull it off?

Title: Find Me Guilty
Summary: In the late 1980s, a low level gangster named Jackie DiNorscio defends himself in court in what became the longest criminal trial in American judicial history.

Title: The Four Feathers
Summary: A British officer resigns his post just before battle and subsequently receives four white feathers from his friends and fiancee as symbols of what they believe to be his cowardice.

Title: The Girl in the Spider's Web - Det der ikke slår os ihjel
Summary: Young computer hacker Lisbeth Salander and journalist Mikael Blomkvist find themselves caught in a web of spies, cybercriminals and corrupt government officials.

Title: Splinter
Summary: Trapped in an isolated gas station by a voracious Splinter parasite that transforms its still-living victims into deadly hosts, a young couple and an escaped convict must find a way to work together to survive this primal terror.

Title: Brimstone
Summary: From the moment the new reverend climbs the pulpit, Liz knows she and her family are in great danger.

Title: The Cooler
Summary: In an old school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss' consternation.

Title: May
Summary: A lonely young woman traumatized by a difficult childhood and unsuccessful attempts to connect with the people around her is sent into a murderous tailspin.

Title: Klædt på til mord
Summary: A mysterious blonde woman kills one of a psychiatrist's patients, and then goes after the high-class call girl who witnessed the murder.

Title: Curse of Chucky
